remarks: Signed area takes value in complex numbers.  Deduction version. (Contributed by Saveliy Skresanov, 23-Sep-2017.)
statement:
sigarimcd.sigar $e |- G = ( x e. CC , y e. CC |-> ( Im ` ( ( * ` x ) x. y ) ) ) $.
sigarimcd.a $e |- ( ph -> ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) ) $.
sigarimcd $p |- ( ph -> ( A G B ) e. CC ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
